roleset.name: not adhering to the constitution

role.descr: thing that does not adhere to the constitution

roles.note: Verb frame's arg0 not possible with adjectives

example.name: with CAU
example.text: The justices agreed that the law was unconstitutional as it applied to sidewalks surrounding the court, but they did not decide on the constitutionality of the law as a whole.
example.arg: as it applied to sidewalks surrounding the court

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on WSJ data. Related to constitutionalize.03.
